channel.title: Netfixes on Dive into nexus of everything
channel.description: Recent content in Netfixes on Dive into nexus of everything

item.title: Netfix
item.description: the datasets was downloaded from kaggle , you can click this to check out the original datasets library(tidyverse) library(RColorBrewer) Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL", "English") ### to handle the language issue netflix <- read.csv("netflix_titles.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE) str(netflix) any(is.na(netflix)) netflix$type <- as.factor(netflix$type) netflix$rating <- as.factor(netflix$rating) netflix_year <- netflix %>% group_by(release_year) %>% summarise(n = n()) %>% arrange(desc(n)) ggplot(netflix_year, aes(reorder(release_year, -release_year),n)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity",fill = "lightblue")+ theme_bw()+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1,size = 15))+ labs(x = "year", y = "number") released movie or TVshows has a outbreak since we stepped in 21 century.
